eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration

Class ConfigConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration.ConfigConstants

  • public final class ConfigConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all constants for the configuration. That includes the configuration keys and the default values.
    Author:
    Stephan Ewen (stephan.ewen@tu-berlin.de)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_DEFAULT_INSTANCE_TYPE_INDEX
      The default index for the default instance type.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INSTANCE_TYPE
      The default definition for an instance type, if no other configuration is provided.
      static int DEFAULT_JOB_EXECUTION_RETRIES
      The default number of retries for failed tasks.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_JOB_MANAGER_IPC_ADDRESS
      The default network address to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static int DEFAULT_JOB_MANAGER_IPC_PORT
      The default network port to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static boolean DEFAULT_JOBCLIENT_SHUTDOWN_TERMINATEJOB
      The default value for the flag to terminate a job on job-client shutdown.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_LOCAL_MODE_SCHEDULER
      The default scheduler to be used when Nephele is started in local mode.
      static int DEFAULT_MEMORY_MANAGER_AVAILABLE_MEMORY
      The default amount of memory assigned to each task manager (in megabytes).
      static long DEFAULT_MEMORY_MANAGER_MIN_UNRESERVED_MEMORY
      The default minimal amount of memory that the memory manager does not occupy (in megabytes).
      static int DEFAULT_TASK_MANAGER_DATA_PORT
      The default network port the task manager expects to receive transfer envelopes on.
      static int DEFAULT_TASK_MANAGER_IPC_PORT
      The default network port the task manager expects incoming IPC connections.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_TASK_MANAGER_TMP_PATH
      The default directory for temporary files of the task manager.
      static java.lang.String JOB_EXECUTION_RETRIES_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the default number of retries for failed tasks.
      static java.lang.String JOB_MANAGER_IPC_ADDRESS_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the network address to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static java.lang.String JOB_MANAGER_IPC_PORT_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the network port to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static java.lang.String JOBCLIENT_SHUTDOWN_TERMINATEJOB_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining flag to terminate a job at job-client shutdown.
      static java.lang.String MEMORY_MANAGER_AVAILABLE_MEMORY_SIZE_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the amount of memory available for the task manager's memory manager (in megabytes).
      static java.lang.String TASK_MANAGER_DATA_PORT_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the task manager's data port from the configuration.
      static java.lang.String TASK_MANAGER_IPC_PORT_KEY
      The key for the parameter defining the task manager's IPC port from the configuration.
      static java.lang.String TASK_MANAGER_TMP_DIR_KEY
      The key for the config parameter defining the directories for temporary files.
